Name: The Bad Gravedigger
About the game: One day, you woke up in a hut in an old cemetery. Later it turns out that you are the new Gravedigger of this burial ground. The cemetery is not very large, but it is very, very dark. Somewhere the wolves howl, somewhere the screams are not buried, and somewhere and the remnants of these poor creatures. You're armed with a flashlight, explore the cemetery and read the notes, maybe they'll help you find you from the cursed cemetery ... We recommend playing with headphones and without light. DLC Insurrection free included
